title: Episode 268: Love Yourself, First (Feat. Stephanie Santiago)
itunes:title: Episode 268: Love Yourself, First (Feat. Stephanie Santiago)
description:
The ladies all get together to address a very serious matter. Stephanie Santiago opens up about her recent struggles with opioid addiction and the recovery process. Stephanie goes into detail about her hardships and withdrawals, while providing advice for those who may be struggling themselves. If you or a friend needs help, don’t be afraid or ashamed to seek the necessary guidance.

 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
